Art knoll

A place to collect the work from my budding hobby. Most use a uniball pen and india ink, and some include watercolor.

I particpated in two art things! A month-long fundraiser in may supporting asylum seekers in VT, kicked off my interest in art this year and I've been trying to keep up with the 2 or 3 a week I created during the fundraiser. Then a plein air in june.

The images toward the top are newer. You can see my transition to getting more comfortable with color.



Making this page also provided a chance to play with a slideshow tool and eleventy's plugin.

Built with eleventy
